data.name: Maid Delight
data.detailed_description:
Maid Café is a visual novel story, where you take on the role of Michael, a young man returning to the area he grew up in, to work as an administrator for a local Café. But on arrival he finds it has now become a bustling Maid Café.



And surprising you even further, you find that many of the people who work there are old acquaintances of yours... Well more than that; past lovers from one time or another making for an even more complicated return home.



Despite its bustling nature, the café is losing money and you have been tasked with working out how to keep the café afloat and through it potentially justify your position at the Café. As an administrator for the café you will need to make decisions that affect the café success or failure.



Your decisions throughout the game will determine the story that unfolds and the ending you receive. As well as whether the possibility of rekindling a romance with one of the many women of the Café could happen as well.
data.about_the_game:
Maid Café is a visual novel story, where you take on the role of Michael, a young man returning to the area he grew up in, to work as an administrator for a local Café. But on arrival he finds it has now become a bustling Maid Café.



And surprising you even further, you find that many of the people who work there are old acquaintances of yours... Well more than that; past lovers from one time or another making for an even more complicated return home.



Despite its bustling nature, the café is losing money and you have been tasked with working out how to keep the café afloat and through it potentially justify your position at the Café. As an administrator for the café you will need to make decisions that affect the café success or failure.



Your decisions throughout the game will determine the story that unfolds and the ending you receive. As well as whether the possibility of rekindling a romance with one of the many women of the Café could happen as well.
data.short_description: A new chapter of your life begins as you return home to manage your friends family café. But things are not as easy as that when it appears that a variety of girls from your past now work there and the Café has been converted into a Maid Café. How will you focus on your work now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted within this game are over 18.

The game includes suggestive scenes as well as some partial nudity with characters in their underwear/lingerie or revealing clothing. Romance and Intimacy and some adult language are also included throughout.
